text: Roger Clark is an Irish-American actor. He is best known for providing the voice and motion capture for Arthur Morgan, the protagonist of the 2018 video game Red Dead Redemption 2, for which he received numerous awards and nominations. ==Early life== Clark was born in New Jersey. He grew up in Ireland and studied theatre, media, and drama at the University of Glamorgan in Wales.https://www.mandy.com/actor/profile/roger-clark ==Personal life== Clark and his wife, Molly, have two children. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
